# Government Tender Announcement: EMC ECS EX300 Storage Support and Maintenance

## Notice of Solicitation

The federal government is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the extension of warranty and maintenance of EMC ECS EX300 storage systems (or equivalent) for the period of October 31, 2024 to October 31, 2027. This tender is open to national and international bidders.

## Tender Description

The selected supplier will be responsible for providing maintenance and support services for the EMC ECS EX300 storage systems, including:

* Warranty extension up to October 31, 2027
* Annual payment schedule as follows:
	+ First payment: October 31, 2024 to October 30, 2025
	+ Second payment: October 31, 2025 to October 30, 2026
	+ Third payment: October 31, 2026 to October 30, 2027

## Solicitation Details

* Solicitation Number: SSC R169976 - BPM021948
* Date of Publication: August 16, 2024
* Tender Closing Date and Time: September 6, 2024, 2:00 PM Eastern Time
* Contracting Entity: Shared Services Canada
* End User Entities: Shared Services Canada
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Sandra Ladouceur
	+ Phone: 613-302-0766
	+ Fax: 613-960-6026
	+ Email: None (available on request)
	+ Address: 180 Kent Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1G 4A8, Canada

## Submission Instructions

* Electronic submissions are required via the Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) Portal (P2P)
* Suppliers must register on the PSPC Automated Purchase and Liquidity (APL) Portal
* Failure to submit through the P2P portal will not be accepted
